fields.name: pathogens
fields.description: List only indicators related to these pathogens, syndromes or diseases.

fields.name: geographic_scope
fields.description: List only indicators that cover any of the selected countries or world regions.

fields.name: geographic_levels
fields.description: List only indicators that are available at any of the selected geographic levels.

fields.name: severity_pyramid_rungs
fields.description: List only indicators that are directly related to any of the selected rungs.

fields.name: original_data_provider
fields.description: List only indicator that are based on data from one of the selected sources.

fields.name: temporal_granularity
fields.description: The temporal resolution of this indicator (not of the reporting).  Might not be the same as Reporting Cadence (e.g. a daily indicator may be reported only once a week).

fields.name: temporal_scope_end
fields.description: The latest date for which this indicator is available.

fields.name: location_search
fields.description: Enter one or more locations for which you are looking for indicator coverage, or leave empty for all locations.  Start entering a location name to see all compatible locations.  Auto-complete with [Tab] or [Enter].  Currently works only for U.S. locations.
